full_text: Beigel ce Pap ie cen 2018/KER/282 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT : THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA THURSDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 14TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8883 of 2017 C.C.NO.630/2014 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT. , VATAKARA CRIME NO. 1552/2013 OF VATAKARA POLICE STATION , KOZHIKODE PETITIONER(S) /ACCUSED 1 TO 5 1 SHAMSEER, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O.MOIDHU, EROTHKANDY HOUSE, THAROPOYIL PO, THIRUVALLOOR, AYANCHERI, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. 2 RAMSHAD, AGED 26 YEARS, S/O.MOIDHU, MADOL HOUSE, POOLAKKUL PO, PALLIYATH, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. 3 THANVEER, AGED 25 YEARS, S/O.SOOPY, MALAYIL HOUSE, KAKKATHIL, MANIMALA, POOLAKKUL PO, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. 4 JALALUDHEEN, AGED 26 YEARS, S/O.IBRAHIM, PARAKKAIL HOUSE, PALLIYATH, POOLAKKUL PO, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. 5 RAHEEM, AGED 25 YEARS, S/O.ABDULLA, PARAMBATH HOUSE, PALLIYATH, POOLAKKUL PO, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. 6 SAMEER, AGED 28 YEARS, S/O.SOOPY PALLIYATH KUNI HOUSE, PALLIYATH, POOLAKKUL PO, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.J.R.PREM NAVAZ SRI.P.T.SHEEJISH TS Bleieee Pa sore} ie oe 2018/KER/282 Cr1.MC.No. 8883 of 2017 () RESPONDENT (S) /COMPLAINANTS : 1.STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN-682031. 2.BABU, AGED 38 YEARS, S/O.CHEKKOTTI, KULAGARTH HOUSE, THIRUVALLOOR, THAROPOYIL PO, VADAKARA, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT, PIN-673541. Rl BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.ALEX M.THOMBRA R2 BY ADV. SRI.AJOY VENU THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: TS Plein ssl ce Sa oe 2018/KER/282 Cr1.MC.No. 8883 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES ANNEXURE A THE TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.1552 OF 2013, OF BADAKARA POLICE STATION IN KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. ANNEXURE B THE AFFIDAVIT SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BY THE SECOND RESPONDENT/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURES - NIL /TRUE COPY/ PS TO JUDGE TS B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are the accused in CC No.630/2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Vadakara, which has arisen from Crime No.1552/2013 of Badakara Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 323, 324, 294(b) and 506(ii) read with Section 149 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto complainant, who is the 2"? respondent herein. 3. The 2 respondent has filed Annexure-B affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioners and presently, he has no complaints against the petitioners. No purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all Crl.M.C.8883/2017 >. further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.630/2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Vadakara, which has arisen from Crime No.1552/2013 of Badakara Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.630/2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Vadakara, which has arisen from Crime No.1552/2013 of Badakara Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/04/01 // True Copy / PS to Judge
